description: Printer auto-detection database with Klipper hardware fingerprints

heuristic_types.kinematics_match: Match against printer kinematics type (corexy, cartesian, delta, etc.)
heuristic_types.object_exists: Check if a Klipper object exists in /printer/objects/list
heuristic_types.stepper_count: Count of Z steppers (z_count_1, z_count_2, z_count_3, z_count_4)
heuristic_types.mcu_match: Match against MCU chip type or serial pattern
heuristic_types.macro_match: Match against G-code macro names (gcode_macro objects)
